meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by enteroviruses.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the enteroviral infection was caused by a specific type of virus.
meanings.sent2: The enteroviral outbreak affected many children in the community.
meanings.sent3: The enteroviral symptoms made everyone in the class sneeze at the same time!
meanings.sent4: The enteroviral spread through the school like wildfire, affecting students and teachers alike.
meanings.sent5: The enteroviral nature of the illness made it difficult to contain and treat effectively.

meanings.definition: A virus belonging to the Enterovirus genus.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the enteroviral under a microscope to understand its structure.
meanings.sent2: The enteroviral was identified as the cause of the recent outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The enteroviral seemed to dance under the lens of the microscope, almost like a tiny performer.
meanings.sent4: The enteroviral invaded the cells like a silent intruder, causing havoc within the body.
meanings.sent5: The enteroviral's presence in the community raised concerns about public health safety measures.
